description: Number of trimagic series for squares of order n.
comments: Asymptotic results are presented in Quist for magic cube and hypercube series, bimagic series, and trimagic series. [_Jonathan Vos Post_, Jun 04 2013].
references: M. Kraitchik, Mathematical Recreations, 1942, see Section 7.10.
links: Michael Quist, Asymptotic enumeration of magic series, arXiv:1306.0616v1 [math.CO], June 03, 2013.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Multimagic Series
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Corrected and extended Nov 15 2003, using the values of a(3) through a(12) from Christian Boyer's web site. - _N. J. A. Sloane_.
